```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#devtools::install_github("ricardo-bion/ggradar")
library(ggradar)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r label, options}
gsc <- read.csv("gsc_nutrition_facts.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r fix}
gsc$Value <- gsub("mg|g|mcg", "", gsc$Value)
gsc$Value <- as.numeric(gsc$Value)
gsc_wide <- tidyr::pivot_wider(gsc, names_from = Nutrient, values_from = Value)
```

```{r label, options}
ggradar(
  gsc_wide %>% dplyr::select(-Name), values.radar = c("0%", "50%", "100%"),
  grid.min = min(gsc$Value, na.rm = TRUE), grid.mid = median(gsc$Value, na.rm = TRUE), grid.max = max(gsc$Value, na.rm = TRUE), 
  )
```
